name: spacewar
description: SpaceWar is a game tribute to the 1984 game by the same name. This game has several differences from the original, however.

scripts.build-web: webpack --config webpack.webconfig.js && mkdir -p dist/web/assets && cp index.html ./dist/web && cp assets/* ./dist/web/assets
scripts.build-electron: webpack --config webpack.config.js && build -w zip -l tar.xz -m zip
scripts.publish-web: cd dist/web && aws s3 sync . s3://www.sagebrush.games/spacewar --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --region us-west-2 && cd ../..

author: Nathan Fritz
